name: Thirteen-Forty
description:
Thirteen-Forty is a puzzle/horror student project set in a gloomy period centuries back: during the Plague in the 1340s. 

A doctor ventures through a world ravaged by the black death to survive the last living resident of the village Sheffield.  They travel through the wilderness and ruins, eventually reaching the town and ruined hospital. 

Play a short game themed after fear; disease, darkness, and the unknown. 

FEATURES
– Be assaulted by rats and dead bodies. 
– Solve puzzles to get across environmental hazards. 
– Enjoy the frightening ambiance created by art, sound, and lighting. 
– Original art by Al Sumstad and Hedjeroo.
– Royalty Free Music from Bensound.
